isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - 13 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RT-6613 SERIES - REASSEMBLE - AUXILIARY DRIVE GEAR/CLUTCH GEAR ASSEMBLY

step1.para: Install the snap ring on the drive gear ( Figure 186).

figure.caption: Figure 186. Install Snap Ring on Drive Gear

step1.para: Place the small diameter of the drive gear inside the clutch gear and mount the assembly in a vise so that the two gears are forced together. For ease in installation of the retaining pin, place the snap ring so that the open section is underneath the retaining pin hole ( Figure 187).

figure.caption: Figure 187. Mount Assembly in Vise to Force Gears Together

step1.para: Use two screwdrivers to pry the snap ring into position inside the clutch gear ( Figure 188).

figure.caption: Figure 188. Pry Snap Ring into Position Inside Clutch Gear

step1.para: Align one of the holes in the drive gear with the retaining pin hole and insert the pin from inside the drive gear into place in the pin hole with the elbow bend facing away from the clutch gear. Turn the drive gear so the pin cannot fall out. Use a hammer and punch to bend the end of the retaining pin down in between the teeth of the clutch gear ( Figure 189).

figure.caption: Figure 189. Align Hole in Drive Gear With Retaining Pin Hole
